comment.shortText:
Similar to `useState`, except the setter function is debounced by
the specified delay.

comment.text: The milliseconds delay before a new value is set

mdx.rawBody: The milliseconds delay before a new value is set

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The milliseconds delay before a new value is set
markdownRemark.html: The milliseconds delay before a new value is set

mdx.rawBody:
Similar to `useState`, except the setter function is debounced by
the specified delay.
```ts
const [value, setValue] = useDebouncedState('test', 500)

setValue('test2')
```

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Similar to `useState`, except the setter function is debounced by
the specified delay.
```ts
const [value, setValue] = useDebouncedState('test', 500)

setValue('test2')
```

const [value, setValue] = useDebouncedState('test', 500)
